scene_description_enriched: A woman, identified as Veronica, kneels and holds up a white cloth, upon which is depicted the face of Christ. She wears a blue mantle over a green tunic and a white headdress. The scene takes place within an architectural setting featuring pink walls and a patterned floor. Through an arched opening, a landscape with trees and a distant castle is visible. This imagery refers to the legend of Saint Veronica and the Veil of Veronica, a relic believed to bear the imprint of Christ's face.
